column1: texts
Her voice is music to my ears.
The world is a stage.
His words cut deeper than a knife.
Life is a rollercoaster.
The moon was a ghostly galleon.
Time is a thief.
The city is a jungle.
He has a heart of stone.
Her eyes were fireflies.
Hope is an anchor.
Their home was a prison.
Fear is a beast that feeds on attention.
The sun is a golden orb.
Jealousy is a green-eyed monster.
Laughter is the best medicine.
The classroom was a zoo.
Memory is a tapestry woven with threads of moments.
His temper was a ticking bomb.
Courage is a wild stallion.
The sky is a dome of crystal.
He's a night owl.
Friendship is a sheltering tree.
Truth is a torch that shines in the dark.
Guilt is a shadow that follows you.
My love for you is a boundless sea.
The road was a ribbon of moonlight.
Despair is a black cloak that envelops you.
The garden was a rainbow of flowers.
Doubt is a thick fog.
She's the apple of my eye.
His mind was a puzzle that couldn't be solved.
Anger is a fire that consumes.
Her smile is the sun breaking through the clouds.
The stars are diamonds scattered across the velvet sky.
Their relationship was a bridge built on trust.
Death is a door to another world.
The mountain was a guardian standing tall.
Joy is a fountain that never runs dry.
Fear is a chain that holds you back.
His ambition was a towering skyscraper.
Suspicion is a poison that corrupts the mind.
The forest was a cathedral of nature.
